item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants and events in Providence.

This week's location is: Coco Pazzo - upstairs from the English Cellar Alehouse off Thayer St.!!!!

Coco Pazzo is THE latest addition to the Thayer Street scene opening a few months ago and connected to the English Cellar Alehouse. The same owners have several other local favorites including The Apartment.

Coco Pazzo features Mugnaini oven baked traditional and modern Italian cuisine and tapas, so whether you have a big or small appetite, this one's for you!!! I'll bet the bar and wine selection is pretty good too

This one's so new, I don't know anyone whose been there yet! So you know what that means - let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

http://www.cocopazzori.com/default.html

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Meetup. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Jerry is hosting this one! Please look at his picture!!!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Coco Pazzo!!!!!
